alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Pinellas; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 5:21PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Highlands, northern Hardee, northern Manatee, Pinellas, Hillsborough and Polk Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tampa International Airport to near Lake Wales. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Lakeland, Largo, Bradenton, Pinellas Park, Plant City, Winter Haven, Bartow, Seminole, Lake Wales, Palmetto, Sebring, Avon Park, Lake Placid, Downtown Saint Petersburg, Fort Desoto Park, Fish Hawk, Saint Petersburg and Brandon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Pinellas; Polk
